item.title: Using 3D printers to solve the PPE crisis
item.description: How we created 2,500+ face shields for NHS workers to fight the PPE shortage crisis

item.title: How to build your Minimal Viable Product
item.description: Do only the smallest amount of work to test your idea, find the perfect spot for tourists but don’t build a mansion.

item.title: From idea to product
item.description: You have a clear idea in your head. You have read all articles about identifying your market and defined your mission, your purpose, and main objectives.
